``` Longer Python code
def run(self): self.assert_has_content() try: lexer = get_lexer_by_name(self.arguments[0]) except ValueError: # no lexer found - use the text one instead of an exception lexer = TextLexer()
if ('linenos' in self.options and self.options['linenos'] not in ('table', 'inline')): self.options['linenos'] = 'table'
for flag in ('nowrap', 'nobackground', 'anchorlinenos'): if flag in self.options: self.options[flag] = True
# noclasses should already default to False, but just in case... formatter = HtmlFormatter(noclasses=False, **self.options) parsed = highlight('\n'.join(self.content), lexer, formatter) return [nodes.raw('', parsed, format='html')] ```
